Test Name: Comprehensive Epilepsy with or without Encephalopathy Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Blood, saliva, or tissue specimen (for DNA extraction)
Purpose: To identify mutations in genes associated with epilepsy and encephalopathy for diagnosis, prognosis, and management.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), bioinformatics analysis software, gel electrophoresis apparatus, PCR and quantification reagents, LIMS
